actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the forgiveness of certain advances made to the unemployment account of Michigan under title XII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Directs that no repayment of advances made under title XII (Advances to State Unemployment Funds) of the Social Security Act to the unemployment account of the State of Michigan which were outstanding on November 15, 1976 shall be required.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the forgiveness of certain advances made to the unemployment account of Michigan under title XII of the Social Security Act.
